content: Hello everyone!Azbit is looking for listing agents. Excellent conditions, payment on the same day.Please contact me regarding this.Telegram - @dan_azbitdan@azbit.comWaiting for your responses.Regards,Dan

comments.body: We have a specific news channel for the agents - https://t.me/+7kaH_lRCUxpjNzU6We invite you to join our team on special terms. High commissions - 20/25/30%, monthly prizes for the best sellers.

comments.author: azbit_official
comments.body: Dear partners!Maintaining the tradition started a month ago, we continue to delight you with promotions and contests! In February, our listing agent Eugene (@ev8.......) referred 7 new projects to Azbit and became the top perfoming agent. Although he refused to accept the iPhone as a prize, he will still receive the USDT equivalent as an alternative.Today we announce the new HOT competition for March 2023!üèÜ Prize: 850 USDTüöÄConditions: - You have to be subscribed to this channel as a listing (sales) agent- You have to refer at least 1 (one) paid listing project to Azbit- We will choose the winner randomly on Apr 1st, 2023!üî• Transparency üî•Moreover, to make it all transparent to all our listing agents, we are now working on a public statistics which will show your current monthly perfomance (basic privacy measures taken) in regards to sales activity and competitions participation. Stay tuned!Join now - it's exciting and profitable!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: can you clarify? This campaign of yours is a reward type and only one participant receives a reward, or will each participant be paid for each listing they make, this iPhone or $850 contest is only a bonus for the most efficient?Also, what is your payment rate for a successful listing (bringing in a new client)?

comments.author: azbit_official
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 04, 2023, 10:45:59 AMcan you clarify? This campaign of yours is a reward type and only one participant receives a reward, or will each participant be paid for each listing they make, this iPhone or $850 contest is only a bonus for the most efficient?Also, what is your payment rate for a successful listing (bringing in a new client)?Hello! First of all, each agent receives a percentage of the sale.1st project - 20%2nd-4th project - 25%5th and higher - 30%We are also doing a giveaway. At the end of the month, we will choose one winner who has fulfilled all 3 conditions. He will receive 850$ extra.Feel free to contact me via telegram, I will provide more details.

comments.author: azbit_official
comments.body: Don't forget to join our special group for the agents - https://t.me/azbit_sales
